content: I'll definitely check out some of these meditation apps and channels. I've been writing down three things I'm grateful for each day in my gratitude journal, which has really helped me clear my mind and focus on the positive aspects of my life. I'm hoping that meditation can help me relax and prepare for a restful night's sleep. Do you think it's a good idea to meditate right before bed, or should I try to meditate earlier in the evening?
